<schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/types" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.org/types" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <complexType name="Livre"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="1" name="isbn" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="titre" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="editeur" type="tns:Editeur"></element> <element minOccurs="1" name="datePublication" type="date"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="description" type="tns:Description"></element> <element minOccurs="1" name="langue" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="auteur" type="tns:Auteur"></element> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="genre" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Editeur"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="nom" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Description"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="titre" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="paragraphes" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Auteur"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="nom" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="prenom" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Exemplaire"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="livre" type="tns:Livre"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="bibliotheque" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="UtilisateurBD"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="email" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="nom" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="prenom" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="mdp" type="string"></element> <element minOccurs="1" name="sel" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="mailRappel" type="boolean"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Utilisateur"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="email" type="string"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="nom" type="string"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="prenom" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="mailRappel" type="boolean"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Pret"> <sequence> <element minOccurs="1" name="id" type="int"/> <element minOccurs="1" name="dateDebut" type="date"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dateFin" type="date"></element> <element minOccurs="1" name="renouvele" type="boolean"/> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="utilisateur" type="tns:Utilisateur"></element> <element minOccurs="1" name="exemplaire" type="tns:Exemplaire"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="dateRetourPrevue" type="date"></element> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="DispoParBibliotheque"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="bibliotheque" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="nombre" type="int"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="prochainRetour" type="date"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="personnesEnAttente" type="int"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Reservation"> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="livre" type="tns:Livre"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="bibliotheque" type="string"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="utilisateur" type="tns:Utilisateur"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="dateResa" type="date"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="dateMail" type="date"></element> <element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="pret" type="tns:Pret"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
